author: rcmatthews
msg: Created a new annotation factory for finding helper method (for names of classes, properties and actions).

author: rcmatthews
msg: Boot loader is no longer dependent on reflector class and so can be moved to the core project.
The fudge to allow hibernate to be loaded up properly has been removed; it is now the responsibility of the hibernate persistor loader to specify the object loader and to tinker with the reflector.
